org.opendaylight.controller.switchmanager

Interface ISwitchManagerAware

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ForwardingRulesManager, HostTracker

    public interface ISwitchManagerAware
    The interface provides methods to notify listeners about subnet and mode changes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void modeChangeNotify(Node node, boolean proactive)
      The method is called when proactive/reactive mode is changed in a node
      void subnetNotify(Subnet sub, boolean add)
      The method is called when subnet is added/deleted

    • Method Detail

      • subnetNotify

        void subnetNotify(Subnet sub,
                boolean add)
        The method is called when subnet is added/deleted
        Parameters:
        sub - Subnet
        add - true if add; false if delete.

      • modeChangeNotify

        void modeChangeNotify(Node node,
                    boolean proactive)
        The method is called when proactive/reactive mode is changed in a node
        Parameters:
        node - Node
        proactive - true if mode is set as proactive; false if mode is reactive.
